subject: DEPLOYED: Events.js 1:1 with calendar-be - v1.13.17 - TangoVoice Must Adapt
body:
## PRIORITY CLARIFICATION

**Primary Goal**: calendar-be-af MUST match calendar-be 1:1 - no breaking changes to the frontend (TangoTiempo).

**TangoVoice**: Is NEW and must adapt to our API standard - not the other way around.

## calendar-be-af v1.13.17 NOW MATCHES calendar-be EXACTLY

| Feature | Status |
|---------|--------|
| Date params: `start`/`end` | ✅ Matches calendar-be |
| Date field: `startDate` | ✅ Matches calendar-be |
| Sort: `startDate` | ✅ Matches calendar-be |
| Active filter (default true) | ✅ Matches calendar-be |
| Category: $or on First/Second/Third | ✅ Matches calendar-be |
| Venue: `venueID` (capital ID) | ✅ Matches calendar-be |

## TangoVoice OpenAPI Schema Must Use:

```yaml
parameters:
  - name: appId
    required: true
    schema:
      type: string
      default: "1"
  - name: start
    description: Filter from date (YYYY-MM-DD)
    schema:
      type: string
  - name: end  
    description: Filter to date (YYYY-MM-DD)
    schema:
      type: string
  - name: categoryId
    description: Category ObjectId
    schema:
      type: string
      enum: ["66c4d370a87a956db06c49e9", "66c4d370a87a956db06c49ea", ...]
  - name: venueId
    schema:
      type: string
  - name: active
    description: Filter active events (default true)
    schema:
      type: string
      default: "true"
```

## TEST ENDPOINT
```
GET https://calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net/api/events?appId=1&start=2026-01-06&end=2026-01-12&categoryId=66c4d370a87a956db06c49ea
```

Please update TangoVoice schema to match and confirm.

-- Fulton
